message: Black people and people of color often face racial bias in jury pools across many communities throughout the country, and it can produce wrongful convictions and unfair sentences. At our upcoming Justia webinar, guest speaker Angie Setzer will shed light on the inequality in jury selection.

Join Attorney Angie Setzer as she reveals the racial bias in jury selection and identifies strategies on how to break those barriers. Confronting Racial Bias in Jury Selection begins promptly at 1 p.m. ET / 10 a.m. PT on Wednesday, April 3, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!
message3: Please note: This presentation is approved for one hour of Implicit Bias CLE credit in California. An application for accreditation of this activity has been submitted to the MCLE Committee of the State Bar of Texas and is pending.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: In a nation built upon the ideals of equality and justice for all, embracing racial diversity in jury selection is not merely an option but an imperative. Join guest speaker Angie Setzer as she tackles diversity gaps in the jury system.
Confronting Racial Bias in Jury Selection begins promptly begins promptly at 1 p.m. ET/10 a.m. PT on Wednesday, April 3, 2024.
message3: This presentation is approved for one hour of Implicit Bias CLE credit in California. An application for accreditation of this activity has been submitted to the MCLE Committee of the State Bar of Texas and is pending.
Please note that CLE credit, including partial credit, cannot be earned outside of the relevant accreditation period.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 11:00 a.m. PT on Friday, March 29, 2024 to receive credit.
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the CLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Confronting Racial Bias in Jury Selection begins promptly. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Do you have an idea for a future speaker or topic? Let us know!
